definitions.definition: Of a thing : done with evasive or guilty secrecy .
Of a thing: that has been acquired by theft ; stolen ; also ( generally ) taken stealthily.
Of a person or an animal : sly , stealthy .
Of a person, etc.: inclined to steal ; pilfering , thieving .

main_definition: Of a thing : done with evasive or guilty secrecy .
secondary_definitions: Of a thing: that has been acquired by theft ; stolen ; also ( generally ) taken stealthily.
Of a person or an animal : sly , stealthy .
Of a person, etc.: inclined to steal ; pilfering , thieving .
